application.doc: Retrieve a single API Access Control Policy

param.name: policy_name
param.doc: The name of the API Access Control Policy.

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve a single API Access Control Policy
method.doc: To retrieve a single API Access Control Policy with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the API Access Control policy resource URI.
Note that prior to running this web service the Verify Access administrator credential must be stored using the Store the Verify Access administrator credentials web service.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

param.name: groups
param.doc: The groups referenced by this policy. User must be a member of at least one group for this policy to be authorised.

param.name: attributes
param.doc: The attribute matches referenced by this policy. Each attribute must be matched for this policy to be authorised.
